value.displayName: Propensity to adverse reaction to drug
Propensity to adverse reaction to drug

list.item:
Problem #1
Hypo Plastic Left Heart Syndrome

section.title: ASSESSMENTS
section.text: The patient was found to have fever and Dr Davis is suspecting Anemia based on the patient history. So Dr Davis asked the patient to closely monitor the temperature and blood pressure and get admitted to Community Health Hospitals if the fever does not subside within a day.

tr.td: Get a Chest X-ray done on 6/23/2020 showing the Lower Respiratory Tract Structure.
Take Clindamycin 300mg three times a day as needed if pain does not subside.
June 23, 2020 three times a day as needed
Schedule follow on visit with Neighborhood Physicians Practice on 7/1/2020.

substanceAdministration.text: Take Clindamycin 300mg three times a day as needed if pain does not subside.

observation.text: Schedule follow on visit with Neighborhood Physicians Practice on 7/1/2020.

tr.td: Get rid of intermittent fever that is occurring every few weeks (Visual Inspection)
Need to gain more energy to do regular activities (Visual Inspection)

code.displayName: Resident's overall goal established during assessment process

observation.value: Get rid of intermittent fever that is occurring every few weeks. (Visual Inspection)

code.displayName: Resident's overall goal established during assessment process

observation.value: Need to gain more energy to do regular activities. (Visual Inspection)

section.title: REASON FOR REFERRAL
section.text: Ms Happy Kid is being referred to Community Health Hospitals Inpatient facility because of the high fever noticed and suspected Anemia.

tr.td: TDr Albert Davis diagnosed Ms Happy Kid to be suffering from Fever and suspected Pneumonia and recommended admission to the Community Health Hospitals
